lead_paragraph: Italy were awarded Russia's place in the Olympic men's cycling team pursuit competition on Friday after the Court of Arbitration for Sport (CAS) rejected the appeal by three Russian riders who were ruled ineligible by the sport's governing body.

headline.print_headline: Cyclng-Italy Get Men's Pursuit Slot as Russia Appeal Fails
headline.main: Cyclng-Italy Get Men's Pursuit Slot as Russia Appeal Fails
